jd: From: Sapna Thakur, Sibi Talent sapnathakur@sibitalent.com Reply to: sapnathakur@sibitalent.com Senior Python Engineer with ML/AI,Sunnyvale, CA (Hybrid - 2 days onsite)Need Ex Walmart Candidate And Local N Contract Type: Contract-to-HirePhone + VideoJD:Note :- Need 85% + Score in Glider Assessment after client take an interview We are seeking a Senior Software Engineer with strong experience in Python and a background in ML/AI to join our team in Sunnyvale, CA. This is a hybrid role, requiring 2 days onsite per week. The ideal candidate should have full-stack development experience and be comfortable working in cloud environments, particularly with Azure.Key Requirements:8+ years of software engineering experience3-5 years of hands-on Python experience (experience with other object-oriented languages is a plus)Full-stack development expertise2+ years of experience working with cloud platforms (Azure preferred)Exposure to cloud artifacts such as Lambda, Redshift, or other cloud-based data storesGeneral cloud experience required beyond S3 bucketsExperience with relational and document data stores (MS SQL, PostgreSQL, Firestore)Must be proficient in writing queries and handling relational data stores effectively Thanks & RegardsSapna Thakur | Sr. Technical Recruiter
